name: Black Fly
description:
*in development*

Black Fly transports you to a tepid summer in the Canadian interior.  The government has instructed you to do one thing: plant trees.  Plant enough and you can make the money you need for your next meal.  How many days can you last?

All assets made by Ben McCormack.

INSTRUCTIONS:  Plant trees and interact with objects with left-click.

Trees can only be planted in the yellow "planting zone".
